description: Details required by conditions 5 (Construction Management Plan), conditions 8 (Habitat Survey Report)  and conditions 16 (District heat network statement) of planning permission 17/12932/FUL
decision_conditions: Recommendation:	That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, is fully discharged.
The plans considered as part of this application were:Site Location Plan;Existing PLans and Elevations; and,Proposed Plans and Elevations.

The quality of advice will be proportionate to the level of information provided, therefore it is to your benefit to provide as much supporting information (plans/elevations) as possible for the proposal.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Acceptable proposal of works including the potential to remove the pine which has grown very one sided, has bifurcated at the base with an included union weakening the structure of the twin leaders and is encroaching on the higher amenity value Oak which would do better if given greter room to develop.Recommendation:Approve.
